resources.string: Who do you want to block?
Block calls on the following days:

This application is used to block calls of people in your contact list. By adding contacts from your contact list to the block list, any calls made by these contacts to you will be automatically disconnected. It is also possible to select which particular days of the week you wish to block these contacts.

This application is provided 'as is' and solely intended for personal use.


The South Island shall use its best endeavor to guarantee the fitness of the software; however, it makes no warranties for all failures encountered in using the software.


The South Island cannot guarantee the calls by any contact added to the block list will always be blocked correctly, or that the application will correctly block intended contacts. The South Island is not liable for any errors, incompleteness, or delays, or for any actions taken in reliance on calls which are either blocked or not blocked by this application.
